Allentown.Talon (roller coaster): Talon is a 135-foot (41 m) steel inverted roller coaster at Dorney Park & Wildwater Kingdom in Allentown, Pennsylvania, United States. It features 4 inversions and close to the ground encounters. Designed by Bolliger & Mabillard, Talon was known to be one of the longest inverted roller coasters in the Northeast when it opened in 2001.
